snippet: Walter Reed National Military Medical Center made a false H.I.V.-negative finding after a mix-up of blood samples.
abstract: Walter Reed National Military Medical Center has for six weeks been engaged in a highly unusual effort to identify an individual who is HIV positive but was wrongly informed that he or she was HIV negative after a mix-up of blood samples taken at the hosptial.
lead_paragraph: Walter Reed National Military Medical Center made a false H.I.V.-negative finding after a mix-up of blood samples.

headline.main: H.I.V.-Positive Person, Told Otherwise, Is Being Sought
headline.print_headline: H.I.V.-Positive Person, Told Otherwise, Is Being Sought

keywords.value: Reed, Walter, National Military Medical Center
keywords.name: organizations
